3.body:
Customer experience (CX) refers to how a business engages with its customers at every point of their buying journey—from marketing to sales to customer service and everywhere in between. In large part, it's the sum total of all interactions a customer has with your brand.                                                     
       Key Business points,             
1.Marketing                                  
  We can sell anything with a good marketing skill.                         
2.Sales                                    
  We have to engage customers with our sales strategies.                         
3.customer services**                      
   We have to assist or help the customers with best possible way before and after sales. It is the one of the most important factor which will lead our sales in positive way and provide branding at zero cost.
3.title: Customer Experience (CX)

21.body:
Hi Faiz,
I can see firebase have free access to some feature up to a specific limit.
Please go through the link: https://firebase.google.com/pricing/?authuser=0&hl=en

In AWS, we also have a free tier but it's limited to 1 year.

I would recommend having a board meeting to discuss this and take the decision as earliest.
21.title: Analysis of pricing between aws and firsbase

28.body:
I really love this feature of Authorization and works well. I just want u you suggest some changes that would be better.

1. Please move the sign up and sign in popups to the middle of screen.
Create a ticket, will work later😜

2. Please add a flag so that either the signin or sign up should show  at once.
Couldu explain more?

3. Please let me know who could delete, modify the anonymous posts.
I addressed it

4. Please let me know why I can't see the entire post when i click a post?
I addressed it. this was because the classname of post in main page and post in post's page was same. And I modified them to display in single line.
